name: TI_2_1_2_5_User_Log_Out__End_user_session__Security_Audit_Trigger
title: TI.2.1.2.5 User Log Out (End user session) Security Audit Trigger (Function)
description: Manage Audit Trigger initiated to track user log out (end user session).
purpose: Capture user log out (end user session), both routine and exceptional, including key metadata (who, what, when, where, why).

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.5#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence of user logout (end session).

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.5#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.5#03
statement.requirement: IF known, THEN the system SHALL capture identity of the user.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.5#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.5#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.5#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time of the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.5#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the location (i.e., network address).

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.5#08
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture how the session ended (e.g., user logout, timeout, loss of connection, administrator logout, system failure).
